Paragraph: Preliminary OPV results show that polymer solar cells based on P1 : PC61BM ( 1 : 1 , w / w ) gave a PCE of 0.30% under an AM 1.5 simulated solar light at 100 mW / cm^2. '

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| P1 : PC61BM |
| P1 |
| PC61BM |

The entities "PCE", "0.30%", "solar cells based on P1 : PC61BM (1 : 1, w / w)", "AM 1.5 simulated solar light", and "100 mW / cm^2." are valid entities that refer to the value of material properties. The entities "Preliminary OPV results show" and "gave" do not clearly refer to material properties and have been removed.
